title: End Behavior Explorer
description: Interactive simulation demonstrating how leading term characteristics (coefficient sign and degree) determine the end behavior of polynomial and rational functions. Features real-time graphing, end behavior arrows, and an animated Delta mascot traveling toward infinity.
